GT.content: demand of gift/countergift, circulatory differance, requirement of restitution “at term,” delayed “due date,” thing itself demands gift & restitution
GT.linkedContent: demand of gift/countergift, circulatory differance, requirement of restitution “at term,” delayed “due date,” thing itself demands gift & restitution

GT.content: la différance, qui n’(est) rien, est (dans) la chose même, elle est (donnée) dans la chose même, elle (est) la chose même, elle, la différance, la chose (même), elle, sans rien d’autre, elle-même, rien [differance, the nothing in the thing-itself]
GT.linkedContent: la différance, qui n’(est) rien, est (dans) la chose même, elle est (donnée) dans la chose même, elle (est) la chose même, elle, la différance, la chose (même), elle, sans rien d’autre, elle-même, rien [differance, the nothing in the thing-itself]

GT.content: counterfeit money: heart of questions of reference and difference
GT.linkedContent: counterfeit money: heart of questions of reference and difference

GT.content: chremastics vs. economy: 1) chremastics, ovular or seminal capital, “bad infinite” of money, no limit 2) economy, oikos, care for home, hearth, limited to necessary goods
GT.linkedContent: chremastics vs. economy: 1) chremastics, ovular or seminal capital, “bad infinite” of money, no limit 2) economy, oikos, care for home, hearth, limited to necessary goods

GT.content: limit gets blurred once there’s monetary sign, or simply sign, once there’s differance & credit, family no longer contained > this originary ruin is chance of hospitality—like counterfeit money, chance for gift itself [Aristotle looks for balanced limit, not Derrida]
GT.linkedContent: limit gets blurred once there’s monetary sign, or simply sign, once there’s differance & credit, family no longer contained > this originary ruin is chance of hospitality—like counterfeit money, chance for gift itself [Aristotle looks for balanced limit, not Derrida]

R.content: figure of renvoi (remission, sending off, deferral) is like differance, trace, it creates spacing, and brings autoimmune in line with aporia, double bind
R.linkedContent: figure of renvoi (remission, sending off, deferral) is like differance, trace, it creates spacing, and brings autoimmune in line with aporia, double bind

R.content: difference as deferral, as trace as gap (becoming-space of time, becoming-time of space) and experience of the alterity of the other: both in democracy
R.linkedContent: difference as deferral, as trace as gap (becoming-space of time, becoming-time of space) and experience of the alterity of the other: both in democracy

R.content: Derrida does not acknowledge a political turn or ethical turn [in his work]: thinking of differance always political, contour & limits of political, around enigma or autoimmune double bind of the democratic (not certain democracy a political thought through & through)
R.linkedContent: Derrida does not acknowledge a political turn or ethical turn [in his work]: thinking of differance always political, contour & limits of political, around enigma or autoimmune double bind of the democratic (not certain democracy a political thought through & through)

R.content: every trace is a trace of democracy, of democracy there could only be a trace
R.linkedContent: every trace is a trace of democracy, of democracy there could only be a trace

R.content: im-possible (nonnegative) seizes me here and now, nonvirtualizable, what is most undeniably real and sensible (like the other, differance of the other)
R.linkedContent: im-possible (nonnegative) seizes me here and now, nonvirtualizable, what is most undeniably real and sensible (like the other, differance of the other)

MONL.content: differance in relation to universal necessity (trauma, lesion), reality, scope of any férance
MONL.linkedContent: differance in relation to universal necessity (trauma, lesion), reality, scope of any férance

FL.content: Derrida often calls, recalls himself, for/to vigilance, to risks spread by this word: 1) risk of obscure, substantialist occulto-mystic concept 2) risk of authorizing violent, unjust, arbitrary force > to avoid substantialism must recall differential character of force, force as differance, differance is a force différée-différante [“performative” force]
FL.linkedContent: Derrida often calls, recalls himself, for/to vigilance, to risks spread by this word: 1) risk of obscure, substantialist occulto-mystic concept 2) risk of authorizing violent, unjust, arbitrary force > to avoid substantialism must recall differential character of force, force as differance, differance is a force différée-différante [“performative” force]

FL.content: from instituting violence to preserving law/contract [modern democracies] > passage from presence to representation, acc to Benjamin a Verfall, forgetting of originary violence in this differance [Derrida doesn’t see this as accidental?]
FL.linkedContent: from instituting violence to preserving law/contract [modern democracies] > passage from presence to representation, acc to Benjamin a Verfall, forgetting of originary violence in this differance [Derrida doesn’t see this as accidental?]

LOBL.content: difference btwn archeaology and eschatology as differance in apocalypse, that will be a while in coming
LOBL.linkedContent: difference btwn archeaology and eschatology as differance in apocalypse, that will be a while in coming

LOBL.content: differance: arrêt de mort or triumph of life

survivre delays at once life & death, line of least sure sur-, no clear-cut opposition, living on like differance, beyond identity & difference > tele-phone, tele-gram only 2 modes of this teleography in which trace, grapheme, does come secondarily but marks telic structure a priori
LOBL.linkedContent: survivre delays at once life & death, line of least sure sur-, no clear-cut opposition, living on like differance, beyond identity & difference > tele-phone, tele-gram only 2 modes of this teleography in which trace, grapheme, does come secondarily but marks telic structure a priori

SPOM.content: [MOTHERLOAD] differance (irreducibly required by spacing of any promise) not only (as some believe naively) delay, postponement, retard, but also sans retard, sans délai mais sans présence, in which “here-now” unfurls (déferle), precipitation of absolute singularity (singular because differing, justement), pledge (perhaps before decision), uncompromising, unconditional
SPOM.linkedContent: [MOTHERLOAD] differance (irreducibly required by spacing of any promise) not only (as some believe naively) delay, postponement, retard, but also sans retard, sans délai mais sans présence, in which “here-now” unfurls (déferle), precipitation of absolute singularity (singular because differing, justement), pledge (perhaps before decision), uncompromising, unconditional

SPOM.content: differance > se liant nécessairement à la forme de l’instant, dans l’imminence et dans l’urgence: même s’il se porte vers ce qui reste à venir, il y a le gage
SPOM.linkedContent: differance > se liant nécessairement à la forme de l’instant, dans l’imminence et dans l’urgence: même s’il se porte vers ce qui reste à venir, il y a le gage

SPOM.content: archaism, not bad in itself, more outdated than ever in ontopology it supposes, by tele-technic dis-location > this unheard of acceleration no less arch-originary than the archaism it has dislodged (déloge)
SPOM.linkedContent: archaism, not bad in itself, more outdated than ever in ontopology it supposes, by tele-technic dis-location > this unheard of acceleration no less arch-originary than the archaism it has dislodged (déloge)

SPOM.content: local differance donne place et donne lieu, spacing of a displacement gives movement its start, stability, sedentarization depends on it > all national rootedness is in the memory of displacement
SPOM.linkedContent: local differance donne place et donne lieu, spacing of a displacement gives movement its start, stability, sedentarization depends on it > all national rootedness is in the memory of displacement

SPOM.content: not only time is “out of joint,” but space in time, spacing
SPOM.linkedContent: not only time is “out of joint,” but space in time, spacing

SPOM.content: Marx opposes work [see pp. 161, 163] to Stirner's work of mourning, his hyper-phantomality, Marx determines differance or deferral as practical and as delay of reappropriation [he doesn’t eliminate death, expropriation, at heart of living—puts it to work?]
SPOM.linkedContent: Marx opposes work [see pp. 161, 163] to Stirner's work of mourning, his hyper-phantomality, Marx determines differance or deferral as practical and as delay of reappropriation [he doesn’t eliminate death, expropriation, at heart of living—puts it to work?]

SPOM.content: difference btwn specter & spirit is a differance
figures of death: differance of technical apparatus, iterability, non-uniqueness, prosthesis, synthetic image, simulacrum, all of which begins in language, before language
SPOM.linkedContent: figures of death: differance of technical apparatus, iterability, non-uniqueness, prosthesis, synthetic image, simulacrum, all of which begins in language, before language

BL.content: differance till death, for death, without end because ended [here we have an example of differance’s universalism: he’s talking about law’s differance, but it is exemplary?]
BL.linkedContent: differance till death, for death, without end because ended [here we have an example of differance’s universalism: he’s talking about law’s differance, but it is exemplary?]

BL.content: law prohibits by interfering, deferring the “férance,” reference, rapport, relation > what cannot be approached is the origin of differance: the law of law (neither natural nor institutional)
BL.linkedContent: law prohibits by interfering, deferring the “férance,” reference, rapport, relation > what cannot be approached is the origin of differance: the law of law (neither natural nor institutional)

HASD.content: differance and trace don’t arise from Being, from presence, even less from [negative theology’s] hyperessentiality
HASD.linkedContent: differance and trace don’t arise from Being, from presence, even less from [negative theology’s] hyperessentiality

HASD.content: trace as possibility of finitude, finite & infinite cause of trace appears secondary, an effect of trace or differance (which is finite insofar as it is infinite)
HASD.linkedContent: trace as possibility of finitude, finite & infinite cause of trace appears secondary, an effect of trace or differance (which is finite insofar as it is infinite)

MPM.content: what if ontological difference is translated into rhetoric of memory? or vice versa?
MPM.linkedContent: what if ontological difference is translated into rhetoric of memory? or vice versa?

MPM.content: Heidegger protects agains abyssal risk of parasitic contamination, of an an-oppositional differance, thus risk and gravity of saying, “essence of technology is not foreign to technology”
MPM.linkedContent: Heidegger protects agains abyssal risk of parasitic contamination, of an an-oppositional differance, thus risk and gravity of saying, “essence of technology is not foreign to technology”

SEC.content: absence of addressee, différance, must be brought to an absolute degree (to make writing possible), not reduced to a presence that is distant
SEC.linkedContent: absence of addressee, différance, must be brought to an absolute degree (to make writing possible), not reduced to a presence that is distant

SEC.content: differance, “the irreducible absence of intention or assistance [due to iteration] from the performative statement, from the most ‘event-like’ statement possible” authorizes Derrida to posit general graphematic structure of every “communication”
SEC.linkedContent: differance, “the irreducible absence of intention or assistance [due to iteration] from the performative statement, from the most ‘event-like’ statement possible” authorizes Derrida to posit general graphematic structure of every “communication”

PP.content: pharmakon is “ambivalent,” from out of its reserve, dans son ombre et sa veille indécises, opposites are opposed, carved out (découper), crosses borders of dualities, it is the movement, locus of play: (the production of) difference, differance of difference, before opposites, not the punctual simplicity of a coincidentia oppositorum [dialectics], fonds sans fond, exceeds, nothing in itself
PP.linkedContent: pharmakon is “ambivalent,” from out of its reserve, dans son ombre et sa veille indécises, opposites are opposed, carved out (découper), crosses borders of dualities, it is the movement, locus of play: (the production of) difference, differance of difference, before opposites, not the punctual simplicity of a coincidentia oppositorum [dialectics], fonds sans fond, exceeds, nothing in itself

PP.content: disappearance, retrait of father’s face (good-sun-capital) is movement of differance, which opens to writing, which writing opens for itself, threatens hierarchical interiority of pharmacy
PP.linkedContent: disappearance, retrait of father’s face (good-sun-capital) is movement of differance, which opens to writing, which writing opens for itself, threatens hierarchical interiority of pharmacy

PP.content: differance at once condition of possibility and impossibility of truth, disappearance of any originary presence
PP.linkedContent: differance at once condition of possibility and impossibility of truth, disappearance of any originary presence

VM.content: differance, difference btwn same and other, is not valid in Levinas’ infinitely other (where peace would not even have meaning)
VM.linkedContent: differance, difference btwn same and other, is not valid in Levinas’ infinitely other (where peace would not even have meaning)

VM.content: for Hegel (against Levinas), difference btwn same and other has no meaning in infinite, except to speak of anxiety of infinite which determines & negates itself > violence in horizon of infinite is that where differance is no longer valid, where peace would no longer have meaning
VM.linkedContent: for Hegel (against Levinas), difference btwn same and other has no meaning in infinite, except to speak of anxiety of infinite which determines & negates itself > violence in horizon of infinite is that where differance is no longer valid, where peace would no longer have meaning

VP.content: possibility of re-petition in its most general form, the trace in the most universal sense, inhabits pure actuality of now and constitutes now via differance
VP.linkedContent: possibility of re-petition in its most general form, the trace in the most universal sense, inhabits pure actuality of now and constitutes now via differance

VP.content: [rare occasion where “dialectic” is compared to differance] “dialectic” opens living to differance, hiatus (of indication and signification) in pure immanence of lived-experience
VP.linkedContent: [rare occasion where “dialectic” is compared to differance] “dialectic” opens living to differance, hiatus (of indication and signification) in pure immanence of lived-experience

VP.content: [commentary > interpretation] auto-affection as voice assumes a pure difference dividing self-presence, makes reduction of world, space, impossible; yet, must pass through reduction “in order to recapture difference in closest proximity to itself”: in closest proximity to movement of differance
VP.linkedContent: [commentary > interpretation] auto-affection as voice assumes a pure difference dividing self-presence, makes reduction of world, space, impossible; yet, must pass through reduction “in order to recapture difference in closest proximity to itself”: in closest proximity to movement of differance

VP.content: movement of differance produces transcendental subject

supplementarity is really differance, differance must be thought prior to separation btwn deferral (différer) as delay and differing (différer) as active work of difference > differance is unthinkable through consciousness, starting from presence, and is not simply its opposite
VP.linkedContent: supplementarity is really differance, differance must be thought prior to separation btwn deferral (différer) as delay and differing (différer) as active work of difference > differance is unthinkable through consciousness, starting from presence, and is not simply its opposite

VP.content: differance as difference btwn ideality and non-ideality
Hegel seems more radical than Husserl in that he demands thought of positive infinite, so that “the indefiniteness of differance may appear as such”
VP.linkedContent: Hegel seems more radical than Husserl in that he demands thought of positive infinite, so that “the indefiniteness of differance may appear as such”

VP.content: Hegel’s criticism of Kant would hold for Husserl; but since ideal, infinite differance only appears in relation to my-death, appearing of infinite differance is finite, the infinite differance is finite
VP.linkedContent: Hegel’s criticism of Kant would hold for Husserl; but since ideal, infinite differance only appears in relation to my-death, appearing of infinite differance is finite, the infinite differance is finite

VP.content: once presence in absolute infinity (unity of concept, logos, and consciousness in a voice w/out differance) appears to itself as its own death, this history is closed
VP.linkedContent: once presence in absolute infinity (unity of concept, logos, and consciousness in a voice w/out differance) appears to itself as its own death, this history is closed

VP.content: une voix sans différance, une voix sans écriture est à la fois absolument vive et absolument morte
VP.linkedContent: une voix sans différance, une voix sans écriture est à la fois absolument vive et absolument morte

VP.content: differance thought prior to or from presence tells us to interrogate presence w/in closure of knowledge > it must also be thought otherwise: dans l’ouverture d’une question inouïe n’ouvrant ni sur un savoir ni sur un non-savoir comme savoir à venir, approaching that on basis of which sa clôture announces/decides itself: openness of this question doesn’t belong to system of vouloir-dire
VP.linkedContent: differance thought prior to or from presence tells us to interrogate presence w/in closure of knowledge > it must also be thought otherwise: dans l’ouverture d’une question inouïe n’ouvrant ni sur un savoir ni sur un non-savoir comme savoir à venir, approaching that on basis of which sa clôture announces/decides itself: openness of this question doesn’t belong to system of vouloir-dire

VP.content: could differance (supplement, sign, writing, trace) be more ancient than the originary?
VP.linkedContent: could differance (supplement, sign, writing, trace) be more ancient than the originary?

VP.content: nothing will suspend it w/ security (rien assurément ne la suspendra)
VP.linkedContent: nothing will suspend it w/ security (rien assurément ne la suspendra)

FSW.content: differance, pre-opening of ontic-ontological distinction, & of all the differences which furrow (sillonnant) Freudian conceptuality
FSW.linkedContent: differance, pre-opening of ontic-ontological distinction, & of all the differences which furrow (sillonnant) Freudian conceptuality

FSW.content: differance & identity, differance in economy of the same
archi-trace, differance, neither Freudian nor Heideggerian concepts
FSW.linkedContent: archi-trace, differance, neither Freudian nor Heideggerian concepts

FSW.content: “no doubt life protects itself by repetition, trace, differance”—but there’s no life present at first, life is trace so we can say life is death
FSW.linkedContent: “no doubt life protects itself by repetition, trace, differance”—but there’s no life present at first, life is trace so we can say life is death

FSW.content: Freud [of Beyond…] complies w/ dual necessity: differance at origin, crossing-out concept primariness > delay is in the beginning
FSW.linkedContent: Freud [of Beyond…] complies w/ dual necessity: differance at origin, crossing-out concept primariness > delay is in the beginning

FSW.content: differance as non-originary origin, erases myth of origin, determined outside teleological/eschatological horizon [horizon key word here]
FSW.linkedContent: differance as non-originary origin, erases myth of origin, determined outside teleological/eschatological horizon [horizon key word here]

TC.content: only way to indicate anti-Hegelianism, not pure difference but difference outside Being as presence, difference as original impurity, differance in finite economy of the same
TC.linkedContent: only way to indicate anti-Hegelianism, not pure difference but difference outside Being as presence, difference as original impurity, differance in finite economy of the same

FWT.content: what is universalizable about differance: allows one to think differentiation beyond every kind of limit, there is differance wherever there’s living [not just human] trace, a relation of life/death, presence/absence > spacing, not an essence, not a (dialectical) opposition, inscription of same that’s not identical, not frozen/fixed [also a meditation on signifier/signified, Saussure]
FWT.linkedContent: what is universalizable about differance: allows one to think differentiation beyond every kind of limit, there is differance wherever there’s living [not just human] trace, a relation of life/death, presence/absence > spacing, not an essence, not a (dialectical) opposition, inscription of same that’s not identical, not frozen/fixed [also a meditation on signifier/signified, Saussure]

FWT.content: differance is at once: the same (living being, but deferred, supplemented by technology, prosthesis) and the other (absolutely heterogenous, wholly other, death, irreducible, untranslatable); ——differance can both interrupt laws and introduce economy of new configuration into living being, it can both be reinscribed in economy of the same and opened to excess of tout autre
FWT.linkedContent: differance is at once: the same (living being, but deferred, supplemented by technology, prosthesis) and the other (absolutely heterogenous, wholly other, death, irreducible, untranslatable); ——differance can both interrupt laws and introduce economy of new configuration into living being, it can both be reinscribed in economy of the same and opened to excess of tout autre

FWT.content: differance appears by leaving a trace (it may not appear as such, it never does)
FWT.linkedContent: differance appears by leaving a trace (it may not appear as such, it never does)

FWT.content: Freud’s grand entities (ego, id, etc.) & Lacan’s grand conceptual oppositions (real, imaginary, symbolic) are too solid, substantialized—differance erases/displaces their borders
FWT.linkedContent: Freud’s grand entities (ego, id, etc.) & Lacan’s grand conceptual oppositions (real, imaginary, symbolic) are too solid, substantialized—differance erases/displaces their borders

OS.content: differance as a difference older than Being itself, a still more unthought difference than difference of Being/beings > leads to a writing that exceeds all dialectics, w/out history, cause, absence, presence, archia, telos
OS.linkedContent: differance as a difference older than Being itself, a still more unthought difference than difference of Being/beings > leads to a writing that exceeds all dialectics, w/out history, cause, absence, presence, archia, telos

P.content: le se-protéger-de-oeuvre (ergon), énergie captée, bordée, condition for mastery of PP, self-protection of energeia > energeia not as pure, total presence (prime mover), but as (par)ergon against what’s lacking in it, lack not as a substantial emptiness, but as impossibility of arresting differance in its contour, in a pose, of localizing lack, like metaphysics does, in its proper place: castration as truth > whether parergon borders (works against) free energy or essential lack, the 2 determinations sont le même (métaphysique)
P.linkedContent: le se-protéger-de-oeuvre (ergon), énergie captée, bordée, condition for mastery of PP, self-protection of energeia > energeia not as pure, total presence (prime mover), but as (par)ergon against what’s lacking in it, lack not as a substantial emptiness, but as impossibility of arresting differance in its contour, in a pose, of localizing lack, like metaphysics does, in its proper place: castration as truth > whether parergon borders (works against) free energy or essential lack, the 2 determinations sont le même (métaphysique)

POS.content: the a of differance perhaps signifies production of sign (signified/signifier): the mute intervention of a written sign found in all discourse
POS.linkedContent: the a of differance perhaps signifies production of sign (signified/signifier): the mute intervention of a written sign found in all discourse

POS.content: delay, delegation, reprieve, referral, detour, postponement, reserving
POS.linkedContent: delay, delegation, reprieve, referral, detour, postponement, reserving

POS.content: never preceded by originary/indivisible unity of present that could be reserved as an expenditure calculated for reasons of economy
POS.linkedContent: never preceded by originary/indivisible unity of present that could be reserved as an expenditure calculated for reasons of economy

POS.content: differance is the general structure of economy, it is the economical concept
POS.linkedContent: differance is the general structure of economy, it is the economical concept

POS.content: what defers presence (its trace, its representation) is basis of its announcement or desire
POS.linkedContent: what defers presence (its trace, its representation) is basis of its announcement or desire

POS.content: differance: 1. deferring by means of delay 2. that which produces different things, differentiates, the root of all oppositional concepts (as common root, also element of the same [not identical]) 3. the production of these differences, of diacriticity that Saussurean linguistics/structural sciences have called condition for signification/structure (neither structural nor geneticist) 4. the unfolding of difference, in particular (but not only or first) Heidegger’s ontological difference
POS.linkedContent: differance: 1. deferring by means of delay 2. that which produces different things, differentiates, the root of all oppositional concepts (as common root, also element of the same [not identical]) 3. the production of these differences, of diacriticity that Saussurean linguistics/structural sciences have called condition for signification/structure (neither structural nor geneticist) 4. the unfolding of difference, in particular (but not only or first) Heidegger’s ontological difference

POS.content: differance common root of oppositional concepts, as common root, is also element of the same (distinguished from the identical [Heidegger]) in which oppositions are announced
POS.linkedContent: differance common root of oppositional concepts, as common root, is also element of the same (distinguished from the identical [Heidegger]) in which oppositions are announced

POS.content: gram as differance neutralizes phonologistic propensity of “sign,” liberates “graphic substance” > gram not an element, interwoven w/ traces of other elements of chain/system
POS.linkedContent: gram as differance neutralizes phonologistic propensity of “sign,” liberates “graphic substance” > gram not an element, interwoven w/ traces of other elements of chain/system

POS.content: differance incompatible w/ static, synchronic, taxonomic, ahistoric motifs in concept of structure because of generativity (via transformation) of a of differance; production of differance not astructural (produces regulated, systematic transformations, even structural science), differance even develops most legitimate exigencies of “structuralism”
POS.linkedContent: differance incompatible w/ static, synchronic, taxonomic, ahistoric motifs in concept of structure because of generativity (via transformation) of a of differance; production of differance not astructural (produces regulated, systematic transformations, even structural science), differance even develops most legitimate exigencies of “structuralism”

POS.content: differance/spacing not preceded by present or in-different being, space/time deferral of present: elements take on meaning or signify only by referring to another past/future element in economy of traces; this economy is inseparable from more narrowly semiotic aspect of differance
POS.linkedContent: differance/spacing not preceded by present or in-different being, space/time deferral of present: elements take on meaning or signify only by referring to another past/future element in economy of traces; this economy is inseparable from more narrowly semiotic aspect of differance

POS.content: no author, agent, or master of differance
POS.linkedContent: no author, agent, or master of differance

POS.content: all conceptual oppositions subordinate movement of differance to an antecedent presence of meaning, a “transcendental signified”
POS.linkedContent: all conceptual oppositions subordinate movement of differance to an antecedent presence of meaning, a “transcendental signified”

POS.content: a of differance, pyramid (A), tacit monument > for Hegel, body of sign compared to pyramid
POS.linkedContent: a of differance, pyramid (A), tacit monument > for Hegel, body of sign compared to pyramid

POS.content: if there’s a definition of differance, it’s the limit, interruption, destruction of Hegel’s relève, wherever it is
POS.linkedContent: if there’s a definition of differance, it’s the limit, interruption, destruction of Hegel’s relève, wherever it is

POS.content: differance not Hegel’s difference of contradiction, which uses a third term to resolve, synthesize
POS.linkedContent: differance not Hegel’s difference of contradiction, which uses a third term to resolve, synthesize

POS.content: differance can’t be subsumed by logical contradiction > differance (process of differentiation) permits heterogenous modes of contradiction
POS.linkedContent: differance can’t be subsumed by logical contradiction > differance (process of differentiation) permits heterogenous modes of contradiction

POS.content: gathering Derrida’s work into a “sheaf,” historic/systematic crossroads, is structural impossibility of limiting network of differance, of putting an edge on its weave, not a master-word, always finds itself in others
POS.linkedContent: gathering Derrida’s work into a “sheaf,” historic/systematic crossroads, is structural impossibility of limiting network of differance, of putting an edge on its weave, not a master-word, always finds itself in others

POS.content: in calling attention to the productive nature of differance, one must also think the deconstruction of “production”
POS.linkedContent: in calling attention to the productive nature of differance, one must also think the deconstruction of “production”

ROP.content: what always rejects analysis: nonsimple, origin under erasure, trace, or affirmation of gift as trace [differance as divisibility]
ROP.linkedContent: what always rejects analysis: nonsimple, origin under erasure, trace, or affirmation of gift as trace [differance as divisibility]

ATIA.content: mark, gramma, trace, differance refer differentially to all living things, all relations btwn living and nonliving
ATIA.linkedContent: mark, gramma, trace, differance refer differentially to all living things, all relations btwn living and nonliving

GSP.content: for Husserl, a confusion of value, and all types of idealities sheltered beneath category “historical”: w/ some precautions [Derrida’s], Husserl considers Weltanschauung a “provisional morality” > system of anticipation that precedes an absolute science
GSP.linkedContent: for Husserl, a confusion of value, and all types of idealities sheltered beneath category “historical”: w/ some precautions [Derrida’s], Husserl considers Weltanschauung a “provisional morality” > system of anticipation that precedes an absolute science

GSP.content: Derrida calls the interminable delay of this theoretical foundation differance [thus morality, any anticipatory system, would be a response to this delay]
GSP.linkedContent: Derrida calls the interminable delay of this theoretical foundation differance [thus morality, any anticipatory system, would be a response to this delay]

PS.content: the “I” who hears becomes the “I” who speaks, stealing speech from the “I” who thinks he speaks and is heard in his own name: s’introduisant dans le nom de celui qui parle, cette différence n’est rien, elle est le furtif: la structure du dérobement instantané et originaire sans lequel aucune parole ne trouverait son souffle [w/out Artaud’s valuation, this sentence affirms differance]
PS.linkedContent: the “I” who hears becomes the “I” who speaks, stealing speech from the “I” who thinks he speaks and is heard in his own name: s’introduisant dans le nom de celui qui parle, cette différence n’est rien, elle est le furtif: la structure du dérobement instantané et originaire sans lequel aucune parole ne trouverait son souffle [w/out Artaud’s valuation, this sentence affirms differance]

PS.content: se laisser ainsi souffler la parole, c’est, comme l’écrire lui-même, l’archi-phénomène de la réserve: abandon de soi au furtif, discrétion, séparation et en même temps accumulation, capitalisation, mise en sécurité aussi dans la décision déléguée ou différée > laisser la parole au furtif, c’est se rassurer [tranquilize? give courage? reassure] dans la différance, c’est-à-dire dans l’économie
PS.linkedContent: se laisser ainsi souffler la parole, c’est, comme l’écrire lui-même, l’archi-phénomène de la réserve: abandon de soi au furtif, discrétion, séparation et en même temps accumulation, capitalisation, mise en sécurité aussi dans la décision déléguée ou différée > laisser la parole au furtif, c’est se rassurer [tranquilize? give courage? reassure] dans la différance, c’est-à-dire dans l’économie

PS.content: for Artaud, furtive differance slipped in btwn 2 forms of writing, placing life outside the work, and making its origin (flesh) the epigraph, the breathless (essoufflé) sarcophagus of my discourse > only through writing made flesh, theatrical hieroglyphic, could double be destroyed
PS.linkedContent: for Artaud, furtive differance slipped in btwn 2 forms of writing, placing life outside the work, and making its origin (flesh) the epigraph, the breathless (essoufflé) sarcophagus of my discourse > only through writing made flesh, theatrical hieroglyphic, could double be destroyed

PS.content: to call differance the furtive is to apply a metaphysics that produces this quality
PS.linkedContent: to call differance the furtive is to apply a metaphysics that produces this quality

O.content: direction or chain of the “metaphysical” can’t be opposed by concept, rather by process of textual labor, the movement of differance, which cannot be relevé—disorganizes opposition
O.linkedContent: direction or chain of the “metaphysical” can’t be opposed by concept, rather by process of textual labor, the movement of differance, which cannot be relevé—disorganizes opposition

O.content: differance not preceded by any identity, unity, origin, etc.
O.linkedContent: differance not preceded by any identity, unity, origin, etc.

O.content: differance inscribes contradictions, is the critical limit of idealizing powers of la relève (Aufgehoben), which reduces contradictions to homogeneity of single model
O.linkedContent: differance inscribes contradictions, is the critical limit of idealizing powers of la relève (Aufgehoben), which reduces contradictions to homogeneity of single model

O.content: the 3 is no longer ideality of speculative solution, but the “effect” of a strategic re-mark > referring name of 1 of the 2 terms [in dual opposition] to absolute outside of opposition (marked once again in exposé of differance)
O.linkedContent: the 3 is no longer ideality of speculative solution, but the “effect” of a strategic re-mark > referring name of 1 of the 2 terms [in dual opposition] to absolute outside of opposition (marked once again in exposé of differance)

O.content: seminal differance: not only the seed, but the egg
O.linkedContent: seminal differance: not only the seed, but the egg

DPi.content: for Nietzsche, cruelty has no contrary—just different forms, values, intensities, only a differance (logic w/out logic of differance is a paradoxical economy)
DPi.linkedContent: for Nietzsche, cruelty has no contrary—just different forms, values, intensities, only a differance (logic w/out logic of differance is a paradoxical economy)

CHM.content: vouloir-dire-l’hyperbole not antagonistic to silence but its condition, not voluntarism but a 1st passion, il garde en lui la trace d’une violence, more written than said: differance of absolute excess (economy btwn that which exceeds and exceeded totality)
CHM.linkedContent: vouloir-dire-l’hyperbole not antagonistic to silence but its condition, not voluntarism but a 1st passion, il garde en lui la trace d’une violence, more written than said: differance of absolute excess (economy btwn that which exceeds and exceeded totality)

REST.content: logic of detachment as cut (opposition, leads to suturing-sublation, maintains problematic of castration truth) vs. logic of detachment as stricture (is tout autre, interlacing of differance of [or as] stricture, no suture, haunting, neither empty nor full, l’argument-de-la-gaine, can’t accommodate the couple, ces coupes oppositionelles, the ghost leases, le, la, les double(s) band-)
REST.linkedContent: logic of detachment as cut (opposition, leads to suturing-sublation, maintains problematic of castration truth) vs. logic of detachment as stricture (is tout autre, interlacing of differance of [or as] stricture, no suture, haunting, neither empty nor full, l’argument-de-la-gaine, can’t accommodate the couple, ces coupes oppositionelles, the ghost leases, le, la, les double(s) band-)

PF.content: those who rush to confuse differance and alibi disavow that they are avoiding “thing itself,” which differance will never be; is differance a political alibi? an allegation destined to delay the deadline? no: w/out alibi is precisely a differance w/out alibi
PF.linkedContent: those who rush to confuse differance and alibi disavow that they are avoiding “thing itself,” which differance will never be; is differance a political alibi? an allegation destined to delay the deadline? no: w/out alibi is precisely a differance w/out alibi

LI.content: differance as positive condition, as possibility > possible absences remark mark in advance, re-mark part of mark itself: supplement, mark, trace of presence-absence
LI.linkedContent: differance as positive condition, as possibility > possible absences remark mark in advance, re-mark part of mark itself: supplement, mark, trace of presence-absence

LI.content: differance removes from itself what was written “in its name,” removes the proper name: changes itself into more or less anonymous multiplicity
LI.linkedContent: differance removes from itself what was written “in its name,” removes the proper name: changes itself into more or less anonymous multiplicity

LI.content: differance of stricture > the writing of God renders possible/impossible, serious/non-serious, strict/non-strict oppositions like “normal” & parasitic
LI.linkedContent: differance of stricture > the writing of God renders possible/impossible, serious/non-serious, strict/non-strict oppositions like “normal” & parasitic

LI.content: differance, iterability—not entirely words or concepts, must take classical discourse into account, accept logic of “all or nothing” > when one no longer does (via differance, mark, supplement…), must rigorously, pedagogically, explain why one changes the rules
LI.linkedContent: differance, iterability—not entirely words or concepts, must take classical discourse into account, accept logic of “all or nothing” > when one no longer does (via differance, mark, supplement…), must rigorously, pedagogically, explain why one changes the rules

LI.content: where the rigorous no longer depends on a binary logic: a more powerful discourse reinscribes “illusory” of “ideal purity” into a thought of its possibility
LI.linkedContent: where the rigorous no longer depends on a binary logic: a more powerful discourse reinscribes “illusory” of “ideal purity” into a thought of its possibility

LI.content: thought, relation to other, “experience” of differance
the play of differance makes “guardrails,” “doubling commentary,” possible & necessary; “doubling commentary”: a reading that is interpretive, inventive, or “productive”
LI.linkedContent: the play of differance makes “guardrails,” “doubling commentary,” possible & necessary; “doubling commentary”: a reading that is interpretive, inventive, or “productive”

LI.content: differance as nonidentity w/ oneself in process of determination > differance is itself nothing outside of determination, never comes to a full stop (not negativity, nothingness)
LI.linkedContent: differance as nonidentity w/ oneself in process of determination > differance is itself nothing outside of determination, never comes to a full stop (not negativity, nothingness)

TN.content: anesthetic interruption in heart of aesthetic phenomenality, anesthetics very ecstasy at heart of pleasure, pleasure as differance w/out delay > plier, prier and invent substitutes, prostheses, fetishes, cultures, technics (all of “history,” before and beyond “hand of man”)
TN.linkedContent: anesthetic interruption in heart of aesthetic phenomenality, anesthetics very ecstasy at heart of pleasure, pleasure as differance w/out delay > plier, prier and invent substitutes, prostheses, fetishes, cultures, technics (all of “history,” before and beyond “hand of man”)

TN.content: differance btwn 2 surfaces: condition of contact & originarily spaced opening that calls for technical prosthetics (makes it possible w/out delay)
TN.linkedContent: differance btwn 2 surfaces: condition of contact & originarily spaced opening that calls for technical prosthetics (makes it possible w/out delay)

EW.content: via “logic” of trace or differance, re-appropriation produces the opposite of what it aims for, thus ex-appropriation is not what is proper to man
EW.linkedContent: via “logic” of trace or differance, re-appropriation produces the opposite of what it aims for, thus ex-appropriation is not what is proper to man

EW.content: trace, iterability, mark, differance (possibilities or necessities) are themselves not only human
EW.linkedContent: trace, iterability, mark, differance (possibilities or necessities) are themselves not only human

CIN.content: “il y la (là) cendres” [cf. POO p. 24 il y a là du secret], “there are cinders there, cinders there are” > losing equilibrium btwn eye & ear
CIN.linkedContent: “il y la (là) cendres” [cf. POO p. 24 il y a là du secret], “there are cinders there, cinders there are” > losing equilibrium btwn eye & ear

OG.content: on (à) but not w/in (en-deçà) Heidegger’s horizon, being no longer transcendental signified but a determined signifying trace, “ontico-ontological” derivative w/ respect to differance
OG.linkedContent: on (à) but not w/in (en-deçà) Heidegger’s horizon, being no longer transcendental signified but a determined signifying trace, “ontico-ontological” derivative w/ respect to differance

OG.content: differance can only be thought by passing through the ontico-ontological difference, a determination that gets erased by differance: this trick of writing (tour d’écriture) is irreducible
OG.linkedContent: differance can only be thought by passing through the ontico-ontological difference, a determination that gets erased by differance: this trick of writing (tour d’écriture) is irreducible

OG.content: unity of arche-trace’s double passage through form and imprint (empreinte) [re: path from Saussure to Hjelmslev, from phonic substance to formalism]
OG.linkedContent: unity of arche-trace’s double passage through form and imprint (empreinte) [re: path from Saussure to Hjelmslev, from phonic substance to formalism]

OG.content: the (pure) trace is differance, is the condition of sensible plenitude, an originary synthesis not preceded by absolute simplicity > w/out originary trace retaining other in the same, meaning could not appear
OG.linkedContent: the (pure) trace is differance, is the condition of sensible plenitude, an originary synthesis not preceded by absolute simplicity > w/out originary trace retaining other in the same, meaning could not appear

OG.content: differance is formation of form & being-imprinted of imprint
OG.linkedContent: differance is formation of form & being-imprinted of imprint

OG.content: differance does not exist, the never being-present outside plenitude > no science of this nonorigin
OG.linkedContent: differance does not exist, the never being-present outside plenitude > no science of this nonorigin

OG.content: writing of difference, fabric (tissu) of trace, permits difference btwn space & time to be articulated in unity of “same” proper body, permits graphic chain to be adapted to a spoken chain > difference is articulation
OG.linkedContent: writing of difference, fabric (tissu) of trace, permits difference btwn space & time to be articulated in unity of “same” proper body, permits graphic chain to be adapted to a spoken chain > difference is articulation

OG.content: “God’s death” & “return to finitude” belong to onto-theology they fight against > differance something other than finitude
OG.linkedContent: “God’s death” & “return to finitude” belong to onto-theology they fight against > differance something other than finitude

OG.content: Lévi-Strauss hypothesizes that primary function of writing is the enslavement of other humans, Derrida says yes, then describes how structure of society (castes, class, organs of capitalization, stocks), the origin of life in general, appears wherever it’s possible to defer (différer) presence, c’est-à-dire la dépense ou la consommation, et d’organiser la production, c’est-à-dire la réserve en général; he then adds [strangely] that the increase in differance [as proven by its extraordinary increase past few millenniums w/out change in organism] modifies life less & less as it spreads out (s’étend): should differance grow infinite, a possibility excluded by its essence, would be God or death
OG.linkedContent: Lévi-Strauss hypothesizes that primary function of writing is the enslavement of other humans, Derrida says yes, then describes how structure of society (castes, class, organs of capitalization, stocks), the origin of life in general, appears wherever it’s possible to defer (différer) presence, c’est-à-dire la dépense ou la consommation, et d’organiser la production, c’est-à-dire la réserve en général; he then adds [strangely] that the increase in differance [as proven by its extraordinary increase past few millenniums w/out change in organism] modifies life less & less as it spreads out (s’étend): should differance grow infinite, a possibility excluded by its essence, would be God or death

OG.content: differance, breathing space, finitude, death makes presence/absence possible: makes possible very thing it makes impossible, produces what it forbids [see TACT/ABSTINENCE]: non-satisfaction (inassouvissement)
OG.linkedContent: differance, breathing space, finitude, death makes presence/absence possible: makes possible very thing it makes impossible, produces what it forbids [see TACT/ABSTINENCE]: non-satisfaction (inassouvissement)

OG.content: begins par entamer alienation, ends by leaving reappropriation entamée ——perhaps Heidegger couldn’t read in Nietzsche the attempt to think differance prior to being (aka presence) > being speaks nothing other than metaphysics: even if thinking its closure
OG.linkedContent: begins par entamer alienation, ends by leaving reappropriation entamée ——perhaps Heidegger couldn’t read in Nietzsche the attempt to think differance prior to being (aka presence) > being speaks nothing other than metaphysics: even if thinking its closure

OG.content: Derrida not looking for a truth signified in Rousseau but an engagement and appurtenance “qui enserrent dans le même tissu, le même texte, l’existence et l’écriture”—same [text, tissue] is here called supplement, another name for differance
OG.linkedContent: Derrida not looking for a truth signified in Rousseau but an engagement and appurtenance “qui enserrent dans le même tissu, le même texte, l’existence et l’écriture”—same [text, tissue] is here called supplement, another name for differance

OG.content: the dangerous differance, the master name of this supplementary series: death > metonymic substitution horizon & source, abyss from which each threat announces itself
OG.linkedContent: the dangerous differance, the master name of this supplementary series: death > metonymic substitution horizon & source, abyss from which each threat announces itself

OG.content: Rousseau: nearer we are to jouissance, further from bonheur ——imagination is differance of or w/in presence or jouissance ——imagination alone has power of giving birth to itself, creates nothing: but receives nothing alien or interior to itself [khōra?] > other name of differance as pure auto-affection
OG.linkedContent: Rousseau: nearer we are to jouissance, further from bonheur ——imagination is differance of or w/in presence or jouissance ——imagination alone has power of giving birth to itself, creates nothing: but receives nothing alien or interior to itself [khōra?] > other name of differance as pure auto-affection

OG.content: Rousseau declares what he wishes to say: writing/articulation are post-originary malady; he describes what he does not wish to say: articulation (space of writing) at origin of language
OG.linkedContent: Rousseau declares what he wishes to say: writing/articulation are post-originary malady; he describes what he does not wish to say: articulation (space of writing) at origin of language

OG.content: what he describes takes place for better or worse, annuls eschatology & teleology just as differance (originary articulation) annuls archeology
OG.linkedContent: what he describes takes place for better or worse, annuls eschatology & teleology just as differance (originary articulation) annuls archeology

OG.content: local difference: differance btwn desire & pleasure

SPEC.content: [vis-à-vis Freud] PP, RP, differance, the same divided, actuality only in the differance, detour, btwn PP & RP > pure pleasure & pure reality are ideal limits, fictions, one as destructive and mortal as the other
SPEC.linkedContent: [vis-à-vis Freud] PP, RP, differance, the same divided, actuality only in the differance, detour, btwn PP & RP > pure pleasure & pure reality are ideal limits, fictions, one as destructive and mortal as the other

SPEC.content: [for Freud?] no mélange of pleasure–unpleasure is possible, mélange is madness > though topical distribution [in Beyond…] is effect of differance, it retains differance in reassuring medium & in oppositional logic > principle of identity is respected by topology, division of sites
SPEC.linkedContent: [for Freud?] no mélange of pleasure–unpleasure is possible, mélange is madness > though topical distribution [in Beyond…] is effect of differance, it retains differance in reassuring medium & in oppositional logic > principle of identity is respected by topology, division of sites

SPEC.content: tendency to stricturing (binding, mastering) foreshadows PP w/out being it, everything en différance de stricture > repetition itself > but there never is repetition itself > allure of this more or less tightened lace
SPEC.linkedContent: tendency to stricturing (binding, mastering) foreshadows PP w/out being it, everything en différance de stricture > repetition itself > but there never is repetition itself > allure of this more or less tightened lace

SPEC.content: Freud’s auto-affective structure of time, life as the auto-affection of death, differance lodged in desire (desire nothing but this) for this auto-tely: auto-delegates & arrives only by differing in tout autre [for Freud, life-death announced to serve the proper, an economy of death]
SPEC.linkedContent: Freud’s auto-affective structure of time, life as the auto-affection of death, differance lodged in desire (desire nothing but this) for this auto-tely: auto-delegates & arrives only by differing in tout autre [for Freud, life-death announced to serve the proper, an economy of death]

SPEC.content: [re: Freud’s Beyond…] to guard one’s fashion, one’s rhythm, what counts is less telos than rhythm of differance, speed of the step: Zauderrythmus (differential rhythm)
SPEC.linkedContent: [re: Freud’s Beyond…] to guard one’s fashion, one’s rhythm, what counts is less telos than rhythm of differance, speed of the step: Zauderrythmus (differential rhythm)

SPEC.content: power (posts) as transcendental predicate (not to be confused w/ death drive or repetition compulsion, gives us w/ what to describe them) > still, though borrowing descriptive traits from Bemächtigung, death drive & repetition compulsion overflow power > there is only differance of power, whence the posts, “will to power” [?]
SPEC.linkedContent: power (posts) as transcendental predicate (not to be confused w/ death drive or repetition compulsion, gives us w/ what to describe them) > still, though borrowing descriptive traits from Bemächtigung, death drive & repetition compulsion overflow power > there is only differance of power, whence the posts, “will to power” [?]
